package.name: asr_flock_of_birds
package.description: asr_flock_of_birds is a package that is used to track angle and position of a sensor-equipped glove
package.author: Bernhardt Andre, Engelmann Stephan, Giesler Björn, Heller Florian, Jäkel Rainer, Nguyen Trung, Pardowitz Michael, Weckesser Peter, Yi Xie, Zöllner Raoul
